main event: Numerous witnesses reported an unidentified flying object described as cylindrical and glowing, seen in Kalispell, Montana on 7 September 1956.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a basketball, observed for 7 minutes at an elevation of 35Â°, and it disappeared over the horizon near dawn., The sighting involved multiple witnesses, including a ceramic tile contractor and his wife who observed it for about 20 minutes., The object exhibited sharp turns and rapid movements, suggesting it was under intelligent control., Some authorities speculated that the sightings could be explained by astronomical phenomena, including the planet Mars., Full investigations were initiated by the Air Force, highlighting the seriousness of the incidents.
witness description: witnesses included a ceramic tile contractor, a housewife, and various military personnel
